eventParts.text: Oh, I’m sorry, I didn’t see you there.
Do you miss that bird you were looking for?
… yeah. I haven’t seen him in so long.
Do you think the vultures have taken him?
He’s not… Yeah, they probably have.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Don’t worry, Kim. I’m sure once we’ve found the stolen seeds we can find your friend as well!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
I’m… Yeah. Thanks.

Kim gains +2 solitude!

eventConsequence.selectionText: I get that you miss him. I’m sure we’ll get to the bottom of this and find your friend! In the meantime, I hope you’ll stay with us!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, of course I will. Thank you!

Kim gains +2 social!
